name: api_vps_screenshot
description:
This command returns a link to an animated screenshot of your VPS.   Only works
* currently with KVM VPS servers

function.name: api_vps_screenshot
function.desc: This command returns a link to an animated screenshot of your VPS.   Only works currently with KVM VPS servers

sid.name: sid
sid.description: the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call

id.name: id
id.description: false to link to the image itself , otherwise a url

example.status_text: Your VPS has no screenshots currently.

input_comment:
* @param sid string the *Session ID* you get from the [login](#login) call
* @param id int false to link to the image itself , otherwise a url
